node.doctext:
Level 6: Scribe

Nothing special happens at this level.

You may be interested in [id://17645], which is now Level 9. Under an old level system, Friar was Level 6. The XP required to attain Friar, and the powers bestowed upon members of that order, have not changed, only the level number has. (See [id://504121])

Back to the [PerlMonks FAQ]
node.title: Level 6: Scribe
